transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan Bhagchand sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir ji.
Executive: Ji ji mujhe bhul gaye kya sir Ashraf baat kar raha hun mera number lagta hai aapke paas se hat ja raha hai kya? Sir wo aapne customer care pe call kiya tha aaj. Main hello karun aapko ek baar whatsapp pe?
Customer: Haan haan karo. kar diya hello bhi kar diya. Mera sir number aap save kariye Ashraf IndiaMART karke.
Executive: Aapko jaise kuch dikkat hua kare turant hi aap mujhe message kara kariye lekin aap sir phone kar dete IndiaMART ko fir kisi aur ka connect ho jata hai. Deepak ji bol rahe ho kya?
Customer: Are Deepak nahi sir Ashraf. Aap isko na Ashraf IndiaMART karke save kariye. Sir kis kis ke number add karunga kahan tak add karunga?
Executive: Uh, ye kaha tak ho pae?
Customer: Mahine mein teen baar number add karne padte hain na.
Executive: Sahi baat hai sahi baat hai. Lekin ab jo hai aaj aapke paas Simran so gayi hogi. Thik hai na? Simran ab jo hai aapka account handle kiya karegi aur jo Deepak tha usko hata diya. Deepak kaam nahi kar raha tha na aap kai baar aapki complaint aayi ki Deepak kaam nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to uske jagah Simran hai wo bahut achcha kaam karti hai isiliye maine usko de diya hai ye account. Hai na? Aur catalog pe bhi hum log abhi isse maine bola hai kaam karne ke liye. Hai na visibility ke liye aur rating waiting ka shayad usne discussion kiya tha. Aap wo kar rahe ki nahi maine aapko bataya tha lead manager se reply.
Customer: Wo kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Haan lead manager se reply aapka matlab thoda kam hi hai sir koshish karo abhi jaise saat dinon mein na ek bhi reply aapne nahi kara hai. Aap shayad whatsapp ya call back kar dete honge lekin jo IndiaMART ka lead manager hai jahan pe sara data save hota hai wahan se aap na do do teen teen message reply kar dijiye kar diya kariye aapko bahut zaruri hai. Usse kya hoga ki jis city se wo lead ya enquiry aayi hai wahan pe visibility badhegi jis product ke liye wo lead enquiry aayi hai wo wahan pe usme aapki jo hai visibility badhegi. Hai na? Ab idhar stone temple ki ek bhi lead ab aap nahi le rahe ho sir kaafi time ho gaya sand stone temple ki to chalo aap le lete ho. Hai na? Aur main main to aap sand stone jaali ke liye hi bolte ho ki lekin uski jo matlab shayad ek aad tukka dukka aapne li hogi idhar recently but otherwise uski jo lead ka generation IndiaMART pe wo kaafi kam hai.
Executive: To mere hisab se ye bataiye sand stone jaali pe jaise star ki services aapki activate hai. Thik hai? Aur usme lead ka generation kam hai to usse achcha to koi aur category choose kar lena red sand stone ya sand stone wall panel.
Executive: Kyunki sand stone jaali mein actually mein lead bahut kam generate ho rahi hai IndiaMART pe. Fir wo jo star services ka benefit hai na wo utna achcha nahi mil pa raha hai aapko. Agar red sand stone ya sand stone wall panel ispe aap use kar sakte ho star ke service category ko. Kya kehte ho sir aap?
Customer: Red red sand stone kar do fir red sand stone.
Executive: Hai na? Ek minute rukiyega call pe. Uh update company paid services. Haan sand stone jaali ko karna hai red sand stone na. Sand stone.
Executive: Red. Sand stone. Red ka option kyun nahi aa raha hai? Ek minute. Sand stone wall panel wo nahi sahi rahega? Uski to lead ka generation aur achcha hai.
Customer: Red red sand stone panel ka?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir sand stone wall panel. Haan to uska kar do usme aa raha hai to uska kar do. Uska uska jo hai sahi achcha generation hai lead ka IndiaMART pe to usme visibility aayegi to usme agar aapka ek aad tukka customer lag gaya badhiya wahan pe achcha kaam ho jayega aapka. Hai ki nahi? Par hume to chahiye ki bhai business aapko jo hai jaise taise mile pehle to kyunki jo aap jo business matlab paisa laga rahe ho fir uska jo ROI nahi nikal pata hai to fir wahan problem hota hai na fir level loose hota hai aapke upar. Hai na? Aur call picking rate to chalo aapko bahut achchi kar rakhi hai. Hai na? Idhar kahin bahar the kya kuch dinon se sir aap?
Customer: Haan haan zyadatar main bahar hi hun.
Executive: Achcha achcha abhi nahi baat hui aapse. Otherwise to aap bahar hi. Haan message message aata rehta hai aapka otherwise ki haan aisa aisa karna hai aisa aisa karna hai. Hai ki nahi?
Executive: Baki wo sir ek employee jo tha jisse aapne ek din laptop ek shop pe online laaye the to wo dekhta hai kuch ki nahi aapka abhi service?
Customer: Nahi wo nahi dekh raha hai na abhi wo.
Executive: Okay wo dekh nahi raha hai. Nahi to usko thoda sa train kar deta na aap bahar rehte ho. Ab ye kya hai ki service aisi hai na sir IndiaMART ki isko jab thoda lag kar ke kaam karo na tab kuch business badhiya nikal pata hai usko thoda samjha deta guide kar deta fir se ki aise aise lead leni hai aise aise reply karna hai.
Customer: Chalo main karta hun aapne number diya tha na ek baar maine uske ladke ka. Kya keh rahe ho sir kya keh rahe ho aap?
Executive: Ladke ka number diya tha na maine aapko ek baar. Ek okay main check karta hun.
Customer: 911
Executive: Achcha rukiye main likh leta hun. Haan sir 911.
Customer: 66
Executive: 6.
Customer: 89
Executive: 89.
Customer: 81
Executive: 81.
Customer: 60
Executive: 60 hai na? 0606 06
Customer: 06
Executive: Inka naam sir?
Customer: Anil hai naam Anil.
Executive: Thik hai to main inse ek baar na discuss karta hun baki ye jo ispe call aayi thi na in customer care pe isko main close karunga baki aapko maine hello kar diya hai aur Anil ji se baat karta hun sir hai na?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik thik okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's lead generation is low on IndiaMART.

- Customer is facing issues with lead manager reply.

- Customer wants to change the category.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested changing category to sandstone wall panel.

- Executive noted the number for Anil to discuss.

- Executive will close the customer care call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss with Anil.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, category change, support
